channel.title: Comments on: Truth or Dare
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: E!
item.dc:creator: E!
item.description: "I never" was always my game of choice back in college :)
item.content:encoded: “I never” was always my game of choice back in college ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Drey
item.dc:creator: Drey
item.description: Well, maybe try a gathering with two friends and see how that goes. Then gradually add more people. Also, beer helps. ;)
item.content:encoded: Well, maybe try a gathering with two friends and see how that goes. Then gradually add more people. Also, beer helps. ðŸ˜‰

item.title: By: Jeff
item.dc:creator: Jeff
item.description: This is a great story. Unfortunately, it seems like I'm getting to be more of a hermit as I get older. I do still enjoy 1-on-1 meetings with my friends, but anything more gives me trouble. I seem to get annoyed and angered by others more easily. I wish I could participate in something like this, but I think I would have a hard time.
item.content:encoded: This is a great story. Unfortunately, it seems like I’m getting to be more of a hermit as I get older. I do still enjoy 1-on-1 meetings with my friends, but anything more gives me trouble. I seem to get annoyed and angered by others more easily. I wish I could participate in something like this, but I think I would have a hard time.

item.title: By: Susan
item.dc:creator: Susan
item.description: I didn't ever have a good game of truth or dare, even when I was in high school. It would never have occurred to me to use it as a route to intimacy in my 30s, but I can totally visualize the evening you describe, and I'm envious.
item.content:encoded: I didn’t ever have a good game of truth or dare, even when I was in high school. It would never have occurred to me to use it as a route to intimacy in my 30s, but I can totally visualize the evening you describe, and I’m envious.
